name: Black Diamond Repo Chalk Bag
description:
Sustainable and simple. Made with repurposed fabric scraps from the Black Diamond factory, the Repo does it's part to reduce the environmental impact on your favourite climbing areas. Oh, and it holds your favourite chalk. Win, win.Tapered shape with a wire rim for easy access.Fleece-lined interior with cinching cord-lock closure.

        Sustainability
